projects.title: HighStreet Metaverse
projects.description: MMO metaverse platform with cross-platform web and VR support.
projects.longDescription: Led the architecture team for HighStreet's metaverse initiative. Designed and implemented networking infrastructure, matchmaking capabilities, and backend systems to support MMO-level experiences. Developed systems to handle NFT data integration and cross-platform compatibility.

projects.title: ComfyUI QualityOfLifeSuit
projects.description: Custom nodes for generative AI pipelines in ComfyUI.
projects.longDescription: A comprehensive suite of custom nodes for ComfyUI, a powerful and modular stable diffusion GUI. This package provides quality-of-life improvements and additional functionality for AI art generation workflows. Widely adopted by the AI art community with 176+ stars.

projects.title: Omar Game Server
projects.longDescription: A scalable game server built with Node.js and Socket.io, supporting real-time multiplayer games with room management, user handling, and seamless client-server communication. Designed for rapid prototyping and production deployment.

projects.title: Online Game Socket.io
projects.description: Real-time multiplayer game framework with Unity client.
projects.longDescription: Complete multiplayer game framework featuring Unity client integration with Socket.io server. Includes examples of real-time synchronization, player interpolation, and authoritative server architecture.

projects.title: SO System
projects.longDescription: A modular ScriptableObject architecture toolkit that enables clean, decoupled game design in Unity. Provides a foundation for building scalable games with data-driven approaches and reduced coupling between systems.

projects.title: SO StateMachine
projects.description: Hierarchical state machine system for Unity.
projects.longDescription: A powerful hierarchical state machine implementation using Unity's ScriptableObject system. Enables visual state machine design with support for nested states, transitions, and state-specific behaviors.

projects.title: SO Events & Variables
projects.longDescription: Event-driven architecture toolkit using ScriptableObject-based events and variables. Enables loose coupling between game systems and provides a clean way to handle cross-system communication.

projects.title: Optimized Unity Scroll List
projects.description: High-performance UI scrolling with object pooling.
projects.longDescription: A highly optimized scroll list implementation for Unity UI featuring object pooling, virtual scrolling, and efficient memory management. Handles large datasets with smooth performance.

projects.title: Battle Blaster
projects.description: Arena shooter with AI bots and multiplayer support.
projects.longDescription: A fast-paced arena shooter built with Unreal Engine featuring AI bot opponents, multiplayer support, and dynamic combat mechanics. Developed as part of GameDev.tv's Unreal C++ course.

projects.title: ShooterSam
projects.description: Cover-based tactical shooter with AI systems.
projects.longDescription: A cover-based tactical shooter featuring intelligent AI enemies, cover system mechanics, and strategic combat. Built with Unreal Engine 5 showcasing modern C++ game development practices.

projects.title: Dungeon Escape
projects.description: Third-person adventure with combat and exploration.
projects.longDescription: A third-person adventure prototype featuring exploration, combat systems, and puzzle mechanics. Built with Unreal Engine as a learning project for character controller implementation.

projects.title: RhythmAttack VR
projects.description: VR rhythm combat game - ITI Graduation Project.
projects.longDescription: A VR rhythm combat game developed as the graduation project for ITI's Game Development Track (T38 GD/GA). Features rhythm-based combat mechanics where players use motion controllers to attack in time with music.

projects.title: VR Training Simulator
projects.description: Professional VR training for industrial scenarios.
projects.longDescription: A professional VR training application designed for industrial training scenarios. Provides immersive, hands-on training experiences in a safe virtual environment.

projects.title: VR Hackathon Project
projects.longDescription: An award-winning VR experience developed during a hackathon event. Showcases rapid prototyping skills and creative problem-solving in a time-constrained environment.

projects.title: JS Native Game Engine
projects.description: Lightweight game engine in vanilla JavaScript.
projects.longDescription: A lightweight game engine built from scratch in vanilla JavaScript, demonstrating core game engine concepts including game loop, rendering, input handling, and entity management without external dependencies.

projects.title: WebGL Demo
projects.longDescription: Interactive 3D graphics experiments using Three.js and WebGL. Demonstrates various rendering techniques, shaders, and interactive 3D scene composition.

projects.title: Estimation Kings
projects.description: Popular Arabic card game - Published on iOS/Android.
projects.longDescription: A popular Arabic card game (Estimation) rebuilt for modern platforms. Led the effort to rebuild el3ab.com's flash games for Web, Android, and iOS using Unity3D. Features multiplayer support with Java/Smart Fox Server backend.
